name: Vader's Cape (V)
Lore: 'A symbol of the Dark Lord of the Sith, and of the seductive power of the dark side.',
Text: 'Deploy on [Vader] Vader.  Vader moves (using landspeed) for free.  While with a Jedi or Skywalker, Vader is defense value and immunity to attrition +2, and his weapon destiny draws are +1.  During a duel (or lightsaber combat) opponent initiates, Vader''s destiny draws are +1. (Immune to Alter.)',
